Healthy: healthy Araceae leaf, vibrant emerald green, glossy heart-shaped blade, firm turgid texture, no spots or discoloration
indoor close-up of a well-watered pothos leaf under soft natural light, uniform rich green tone, smooth reflective surface, clean neutral background
Bacterial_wilt_disease: Araceae leaf with bacterial wilt, drooping limp tissue, water-soaked dark lesions along veins, uneven yellowing
macro indoor view of a wilted pothos leaf showing limp texture, dark wet streaks near the petiole, partially yellow chlorotic areas, moisture beading on the surface
Manganese_Toxicity: Araceae leaf affected by manganese toxicity, scattered black necrotic specks, patchy interveinal chlorosis, dull texture
close-up of pothos foliage displaying micronutrient toxicity: yellow-green blotches between veins, numerous dark pin-point spots, fading gloss, indoor lighting

Healthy: healthy snake plant leaf, upright rigid blade, crisp dark and light green banding, glossy waxy surface
studio-like indoor view of pristine sansevieria leaf, turgid posture, sharp variegation stripes, clean intact margins, reflective sheen
Anthracnose: snake plant leaf with anthracnose lesions, discrete dark sunken patches with pale halos across the mid-blade
macro detail of sansevieria anthracnose showing rough depressed brown-black spots, defined borders, dry centers, scattered along the flat blade while the leaf remains rigid
Leaf_Withering: snake plant leaf undergoing withering, overall drooping blade, longitudinal wrinkles, muted dull green color
indoor view of dehydrated sansevieria leaf bending from the base, supple rubbery texture, matte finish, fine surface folds, no discrete fungal lesions
Fungal_leaf_spot: spider plant leaf with fungal spots, multiple brown circular lesions with yellow halos scattered along the blade
macro image of chlorophytum showing peppered dark necrotic spots away from the tip, rough dry centers, surrounding tissue still green under indoor lighting
Leaf_Tip_Necrosis: spider plant leaf with tip necrosis, brown desiccated apex and edges, crisp brittle texture contrasting green base
detail of chlorophytum leaf indoors, sharp boundary between burnt tan tip and healthy green blade, curled dry margins, no mid-blade spotting
